chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 12 mini has a problem:
I need to cancel the order.
Thank you,

Hello Ecomobile

It's a pleasure to greet you

The customer opens incident because he wants to cancel the order

Could you please cancel the shipment and refund this order?

Thank you very much for your service

Regards,
Hillary, Back Market Customer Service

Dear Backcare,

We have contacted our logistics partner about the cancellation of the order. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Hello Ecomobile

It is a pleasure to greet you again

Is there any news?

Regards,
Hillary, Back Market Customer Service

Dear Backcare, 

The refund has been made. 

Regards, 
RK
